title: Ticket #277: Avoid unneeded evaluation of job policy in new shadow
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Dan's patch prevents the new Shadow from evaluating the job policy when it receives the job_exit RSC from the Starter. According to Dan, it is unneeded since the Starter will have just sent the final update which would have triggered an evaluation. In addition, Dan says that the job ad is in an inconsistent state when the job policy is evaluated as a result of the job_exit RSC (I don't know what the details are regarding the inconsistent state).

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (26).
